content: crochet a monster keychain for family and friends perfect gift for halloween treat bags and trick-or-treat parties kepp your keys save with these adorable key covers in the pattern you will find step-by-step written instructions on how to crochet the following keychains a pumpkin keyring a witch key cover and 2 different monster keychains materials sport weight/ dk weight yarn crochet hook size 3mm a key ring tapestry needle ******* this listing is for the digital pdf pattern not the toy itself ******** the pattern is written in us crochet terms in english if you have any questions regarding your purchase or pattern please contact us via direct message
